text: @NYGovCuomo I’m shocked at the high level of ignorance of medicine/biology here. The size of an individual COVID-19 virus is SO SMALL that it will travel straight through ALL cloth & surgical masks. There is also potential to travel straight through an N-95 mask. Masks are very over-rated!
